tool.name: quotas
tool.command:
parsec quotas update_quota --quota_id "$quota_id"
#if $name --name "$name" #end if #if $description --description "$description" #end if #if $amount --amount "$amount" #end if #if $operation --operation "$operation" #end if #if $default --default "$default" #end if #if $in_users --in_users "$in_users" #end if #if $in_groups --in_groups "$in_groups" #end if
| jq -S . > $results

param.name: name
param.label: name
param.help: Name for the new quota. This must be unique within a Galaxy instance.

param.name: description
param.label: description
param.help: Quota description. If you supply this parameter, but not the name, an error will be thrown.

param.name: operation
param.label: operation
param.help: One of (``+``, ``-``, ``=``). If you wish to change this value, you must also provide the ``amount``, otherwise it will not take effect.

param.name: default
param.label: default
param.help: Whether or not this is a default quota. Valid values are ``no``, ``unregistered``, ``registered``. Calling this method with ``default=\

param.name: in_users
param.label: in_users
param.help: A list of user IDs or user emails.

param.name: in_groups
param.label: in_groups
param.help: A list of group IDs or names.
